verses.esv: 8 Draw near to God, and he will draw near to you. Cleanse your hands, you sinners, and purify your hearts, you double-minded.
verses.kjv: 8 Draw nigh to God, and he will draw nigh to you. Cleanse your hands, ye sinners; and purify your hearts, ye double minded.
verses.niv: 8 Come near to God and he will come near to you. Wash your hands, you sinners, and purify your hearts, you double-minded.

verses.esv: 6 And without faith it is impossible to please him, for whoever would draw near to God must believe that he exists and that he rewards those who seek him.
verses.kjv: 6 But without faith it is impossible to please him: for he that cometh to God must believe that he is, and that he is a rewarder of them that diligently seek him.
verses.niv: 6 And without faith it is impossible to please God, because anyone who comes to him must believe that he exists and that he rewards those who earnestly seek him.

verses.esv: 4 Little children, you are from God and have overcome them, for he who is in you is greater than he who is in the world.
verses.kjv: 4 Ye are of God, little children, and have overcome them: because greater is he that is in you, than he that is in the world.
verses.niv: 4 You, dear children, are from God and have overcome them, because the one who is in you is greater than the one who is in the world.

verses.esv: 16 “I, Jesus, have sent my angel to testify to you about these things for the churches. I am the root and the descendant of David, the bright morning star.”
verses.kjv: 16 I Jesus have sent mine angel to testify unto you these things in the churches. I am the root and the offspring of David, and the bright and morning star.
verses.niv: 16 "I, Jesus, have sent my angel to give you this testimony for the churches. I am the Root and the Offspring of David, and the bright Morning Star."

verses.esv: 8 he is a double-minded man, unstable in all his ways.
verses.kjv: 8 A double minded man is unstable in all his ways.
verses.niv: 8 he is a double-minded man, unstable in all he does.

verses.esv: 7 for God gave us a spirit not of fear but of power and love and self-control.
verses.kjv: 7 For God hath not given us the spirit of fear; but of power, and of love, and of a sound mind.
verses.niv: 7 For God did not give us a spirit of timidity, but a spirit of power, of love and of self-discipline.

verses.kjv: 6 And the angels which kept not their first estate, but left their own habitation, he hath reserved in everlasting chains under darkness unto the judgment of the great day.
verses.niv: 1 Jude, a servant of Jesus Christ and a brother of James, To those who have been called, who are loved by God the Father and kept by Jesus Christ:

verses.esv: 9 No one born of God makes a practice of sinning, for God’s seed abides in him; and he cannot keep on sinning, because he has been born of God.
verses.kjv: 9 Whosoever is born of God doth not commit sin; for his seed remaineth in him: and he cannot sin, because he is born of God.
verses.niv: 9 No one who is born of God will continue to sin, because God's seed remains in him; he cannot go on sinning, because he has been born of God.

verses.esv: 10 And after you have suffered a little while, the God of all grace, who has called you to his eternal glory in Christ, will himself restore, confirm, strengthen, and establish you.
verses.kjv: 10 But the God of all grace, who hath called us unto his eternal glory by Christ Jesus, after that ye have suffered a while, make you perfect, stablish, strengthen, settle you.
verses.niv: 10 And the God of all grace, who called you to his eternal glory in Christ, after you have suffered a little while, will himself restore you and make you strong, firm and steadfast.

verses.esv: 17 Therefore, if anyone is in Christ, he is a new creation. The old has passed away; behold, the new has come.
verses.kjv: 17 Therefore if any man be in Christ, he is a new creature: old things are passed away; behold, all things are become new.
verses.niv: 17 Therefore, if anyone is in Christ, he is a new creation; the old has gone, the new has come!

verses.esv: 4 In their case the god of this world has blinded the minds of the unbelievers, to keep them from seeing the light of the gospel of the glory of Christ, who is the image of God.
verses.kjv: 4 In whom the god of this world hath blinded the minds of them which believe not, lest the light of the glorious gospel of Christ, who is the image of God, should shine unto them.
verses.niv: 4 The god of this age has blinded the minds of unbelievers, so that they cannot see the light of the gospel of the glory of Christ, who is the image of God.

verses.esv: 3 For this is the love of God, that we keep his commandments. And his commandments are not burdensome.
verses.kjv: 3 For this is the love of God, that we keep his commandments: and his commandments are not grievous.
verses.niv: 3 This is love for God: to obey his commands. And his commands are not burdensome,

verses.esv: 8 For by grace you have been saved through faith. And this is not your own doing; it is the gift of God,
verses.kjv: 8 For by grace are ye saved through faith; and that not of yourselves: it is the gift of God:
verses.niv: 8 For it is by grace you have been saved, through faith--and this not from yourselves, it is the gift of God--

verses.esv: 2:1 My little children, I am writing these things to you so that you may not sin. But if anyone does sin, we have an advocate with the Father, Jesus Christ the righteous.
verses.kjv: 1 My little children, these things write I unto you, that ye sin not. And if any man sin, we have an advocate with the Father, Jesus Christ the righteous:
verses.niv: 1 My dear children, I write this to you so that you will not sin. But if anybody does sin, we have one who speaks to the Father in our defense--Jesus Christ, the Righteous One.

verses.esv: 38 And Peter said to them, “Repent and be baptized every one of you in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins, and you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.
verses.kjv: 38 Then Peter said unto them, Repent, and be baptized every one of you in the name of Jesus Christ for the remission of sins, and ye shall receive the gift of the Holy Ghost.
verses.niv: 38 Peter replied, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

verses.esv: 16 “For God so loved the world, that he gave his only Son, that whoever believes in him should not perish but have eternal life.
verses.kjv: 16 For God so loved the world, that he gave his only begotten Son, that whosoever believeth in him should not perish, but have everlasting life.
verses.niv: 16 "For God so loved the world that he gave his one and only Son, that whoever believes in him shall not perish but have eternal life.

verses.esv:
9   The heart is deceitful above all things,
    and desperately sick;
    who can understand it?
verses.kjv: 9 The heart is deceitful above all things, and desperately wicked: who can know it?
verses.niv: 9 The heart is deceitful above all things and beyond cure. Who can understand it?

verses.esv: 9 If we confess our sins, he is faithful and just to forgive us our sins and to cleanse us from all unrighteousness.
verses.kjv: 9 If we confess our sins, he is faithful and just to forgive us our sins, and to cleanse us from all unrighteousness.
verses.niv: 9 If we confess our sins, he is faithful and just and will forgive us our sins and purify us from all unrighteousness.

verses.esv:
2 according to the foreknowledge of God the Father, in the sanctification of the Spirit, for obedience to Jesus Christ and for sprinkling with his blood:

May grace and peace be multiplied to you.
verses.kjv: 2 Elect according to the foreknowledge of God the Father, through sanctification of the Spirit, unto obedience and sprinkling of the blood of Jesus Christ: Grace unto you, and peace, be multiplied.
verses.niv: 2 who have been chosen according to the foreknowledge of God the Father, through the sanctifying work of the Spirit, for obedience to Jesus Christ and sprinkling by his blood: Grace and peace be yours in abundance.

verses.esv: 16 Therefore, confess your sins to one another and pray for one another, that you may be healed. The prayer of a righteous person has great power as it is working.
verses.kjv: 16 Confess your faults one to another, and pray one for another, that ye may be healed. The effectual fervent prayer of a righteous man availeth much.
verses.niv: 16 Therefore confess your sins to each other and pray for each other so that you may be healed. The prayer of a righteous man is powerful and effective.

verses.esv: 8 For by grace you have been saved through faith. And this is not your own doing; it is the gift of God, 9 not a result of works, so that no one may boast. 10 For we are his workmanship, created in Christ Jesus for good works, which God prepared beforehand, that we should walk in them.
verses.kjv: 8 For by grace are ye saved through faith; and that not of yourselves: it is the gift of God: 9 Not of works, lest any man should boast. 10 For we are his workmanship, created in Christ Jesus unto good works, which God hath before ordained that we should walk in them.
verses.niv: 8 For it is by grace you have been saved, through faith--and this not from yourselves, it is the gift of God-- 9 not by works, so that no one can boast. 10 For we are God's workmanship, created in Christ Jesus to do good works, which God prepared in advance for us to do.

verses.esv: 20 I have been crucified with Christ. It is no longer I who live, but Christ who lives in me. And the life I now live in the flesh I live by faith in the Son of God, who loved me and gave himself for me.
verses.kjv: 20 I am crucified with Christ: nevertheless I live; yet not I, but Christ liveth in me: and the life which I now live in the flesh I live by the faith of the Son of God, who loved me, and gave himself for me.
verses.niv: 20 I have been crucified with Christ and I no longer live, but Christ lives in me. The life I live in the body, I live by faith in the Son of God, who loved me and gave himself for me.

verses.esv: 17 So faith comes from hearing, and hearing through the word of Christ.
verses.kjv: 17 So then faith cometh by hearing, and hearing by the word of God.
verses.niv: 17 Consequently, faith comes from hearing the message, and the message is heard through the word of Christ.

verses.esv: 4 We were buried therefore with him by baptism into death, in order that, just as Christ was raised from the dead by the glory of the Father, we too might walk in newness of life.
verses.kjv: 4 Therefore we are buried with him by baptism into death: that like as Christ was raised up from the dead by the glory of the Father, even so we also should walk in newness of life.
verses.niv: 4 We were therefore buried with him through baptism into death in order that, just as Christ was raised from the dead through the glory of the Father, we too may live a new life.

verses.esv: 15 “If you love me, you will keep my commandments.
verses.kjv: 15 If ye love me, keep my commandments.
verses.niv: 15 "If you love me, you will obey what I command.
